remarks:
Equivalent wff's correspond to equal class abstractions.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Nov-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 16-Nov-2019.) 

---

 Equivalent wff's correspond to equal class abstractions.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Nov-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Aug-2016.)
statement: abbi $p |- ( A. x ( ph <-> ps ) <-> { x | ph } = { x | ps } ) $.
